The purpose of Business Improvement Districts (BIDs) is to promote retail activity in a defined area. Urban planners see BIDs as a tool to revitalize inner-city districts. In North America BIDs are well established and have proven successful in many cases. The first German BID began operation in 2005 in Hamburg-Bergedorf.
